for (i in unique(df$location_name)){

scale_colour_gradient(low = "yellow", high = "dark blue")+
facet_wrap(~variable,ncol = 5)+
theme(strip.text = element_text(size = 8), strip.background = element_rect(size
= 0.3) )

all_locs
